msg2: Join us in a new delivery revolution
intro1: Are you facing challenging times with truck delivery?
intro2: In Holma, we are aware of this important challenge, and we decided to bring a new solution that is based on some key features.
intro3: Each delivery is split among multiple drivers during its path.
intro4: Splitting deliveries motivate new people to join the crew.
intro5: The deliveries will be shorter since the drivers won't stop for hours until the next day.
intro6: The app is going to provide the drivers the fastest and ECO friendly paths using AI.
intro7: Join us in this new tech revolution and deliver father and faster than ever!
